coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside the chest plate, faint rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's riot armour
coreAtributes.description: A set of metallic panels attached to a sleeved vest made from ballistic fibres, it is the best protection available to an ordinary Enforcer. Despite its bulk, the two-piece design allows the wearer to put the armour on or take it off without needing to remove any headgear.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(buckle)] the armour together around [npc.her] torso and [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(buckle)] the armour together around [npc2.namePos] torso and [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(buckle)] the armour together around [npc2.namePos] torso and [npc.verb(tighten)] the adjustment straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the adjustment straps on [npc.her] armour and [npc.verb(unbuckles)] them, letting the two halves fall away.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the adjustment straps on [npc2.namePos] armour and [npc.verb(unbuckles)] them, letting the two halves fall away.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the adjustment straps on [npc2.namePos] armour until they're loose enough and [npc.verb(pop)] open the buckles, flinging the two halves away.
